name: io.github.exa-labs/exa-mcp-server
description: The Exa MCP server enables AI assistants to perform real-time web searches using Exa's powerful search API, providing structured search results including titles, URLs, and content snippets, caching recent searches as resources, handling rate limiting and errors gracefully, and supporting real-time web crawling for fresh content.

environment_variables.name: EXA_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for Exa search API

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Performs real-time web searches with optimized results and content extraction

tools.name: research_paper_search
tools.description: Specialized search focused on academic papers and research content

tools.name: twitter_search
tools.description: Dedicated Twitter/X.com search that finds tweets, profiles, and conversations

tools.name: company_research
tools.description: Comprehensive company research tool that crawls company websites to gather detailed information about businesses

tools.name: crawling
tools.description: Extracts content from specific URLs, useful for reading articles, PDFs, or any web page when you have the exact URL
